# nextFocusedView

**Instance Property**

The view that takes the focus after the focus update.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var nextFocusedView: UIView? { get }
```

## Discussion

If your app targets tvOS 10 and later, use [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFocusUpdateContext/nextFocusedItem] instead.

This property returns `nil` if no view will be focused after the update.

## Locating focus direction

- **previouslyFocusedView**: The view that was focused before the focus update.
- **focusHeading**: The heading in which the focus update is occurring.
- **UIFocusHeading**: The general type of an event.
